LearningProgram.name: LearningProgram
LearningProgram.description: Represents information about one or more trainings in a program that’s required to obtain a credential.

AcademicLevel.description: The applicable point in the education process.

ActiveFromDate.description: Date the Learning Program became active.

ActiveToDate.description: Date the Learning Program became inactive.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the learning program.

CipCode.description: Classification of Instructional Programming code that identifies the program or field of study.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency.

Description.description: The description of the Learning Program.

DoesCreateOpportunityRecord.description: Indicates whether an Opportunity record is created (true) or not (false) for expressions of interest in the Learning Program. The default value is false.

DoesGroupOpportunities.description: Indicates whether an applicant’s academic interests are linked to a single opportunity (true) or not (false). This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

Duration.description: The allocated length of time for completion of the Learning Program.

DurationUnit.description: The unit of measurement for the length of time for completion.

Format.description: Specifies the format in which the learning program is offered.

Grade.description: Specifies the grade of the learning program.

ImageUrl.description: The URL to an image for the learning program.

IsActive.description: Specifies that the Learning Program is active.

IsTopLevelProgram.description: Identifies whether the learning program is a top-level program (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, it’s possible the user accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but didn’t view it.

LearningId.description: Learning (unique parent field) associated with a Learning Program.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

Name.description: Name of the Learning Program that leads to a Learning Achievement.

Product2Id.description: The product associated with the learning program.

ProviderId.description: Account of the institution that provides the Learning Program.

ShortDescription.description: The short description of the learning program.
